post.text: Not every wound can be seen. Our veterans deserve the best mental health services we can give. #NBCNewsForum

comment.author: Haley
comment.text: YOUR "HEADER" DEFENSE IS SO WEAK, MY SIX YEAR OLD IS LAUGHING AT YOU

replies.author: Derick
replies.text: Ummmm maybe you should ask the government how they mark their classified top secret information - because you clearly are uninformed
